title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.7 - Consolidation; severance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.7 - Consolidation; severance

State Regulations

Two or more proceedings under sections 705 and 706 of
SERA, or either, may be consolidated by the director of PEPR or the designated
hearing officer. Such proceedings may be severed by the director of PEPR or the
designated hearing officer in their discretion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.7

Renumbered from 253.20

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
